actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to require that members of the Armed Forces on active-duty residing in a State and dependents of such members be treated as in-State residents for purposes of tuition and fees charged at public educational institutions in that State.

summary.text: Requires that members of the armed forces on active duty and their dependents residing in a State be considered in-State residents for purposes of tuition and fees charged by any public educational institution.

titles.title: A bill to require that members of the Armed Forces on active-duty residing in a State and dependents of such members be treated as in-State residents for purposes of tuition and fees charged at public educational institutions in that State.
